text: The 2005 Pan American Women's Handball Championship was the eighth edition of the Pan American Women's Handball Championship, held in Brazil. It acted as the American qualifying tournament for the 2005 World Women's Handball Championship. ==Standings== ==Results== All times are local (UTC−3). \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Final ranking== {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2005 World Championship |} {| class="wikitable" !Rank !Team |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:gold medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:silver medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:bronze medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|4|| |- |align=center|5|| |- |align=center|6|| |} ==External links== *Results on todor66.com 2005 Women American Women's Handball Championship Pan Category:2005 in Brazilian women's sport Category:May 2005 sports events in South America
title: 2005 Pan American Women's Handball Championship
